# numberValue

**Type Property**

The value of the metadata item as a number.

## Declaration

```swift
static var numberValue: AVAsyncProperty<Root, NSNumber?> { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsynchronousKeyValueLoading/load(_:isolation:)] method to retrieve the property value.

This value is `nil` if the system can’t represent the value as a number.

## Loading values

- **dataType**: The data type of the metadata item’s value.
- **value**: The value of the metadata item.
- **stringValue**: The value of the metadata item as a string.
- **dateValue**: The value of the metadata item as a date.
- **dataValue**: The value of the metadata item as a data value.
- **extraAttributes**: A dictionary of additional attributes for the item.
